name: Senstronics Ltd
description: Senstronics Ltd is hiring a full-time, permanent Automation Engineer (Manufacturing) with an annual salary of £45,000 to work 37.5 hours per week in Newton Aycliffe, providing support to enhance and troubleshoot manufacturing operations; successful candidates should have at least five years’ experience in a high-volume production environment, expertise in various processes and programming systems, and a bachelor's degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering or higher.
